mapper.select: select * from eaexception where 1=1 and EXCEPTIONID= #{EXCEPTIONID} and EXCEPTIONID= #{EXCEPTIONID} and EXCEPTIONID= #{EXCEPTIONID} and EXCEPTIONID= #{EXCEPTIONID}
mapper.delete: delete eaexception where 1=1 and EXCEPTIONID= #{EXCEPTIONID} and EXCEPTIONID= #{EXCEPTIONID} and EXCEPTIONID= #{EXCEPTIONID} and EXCEPTIONID= #{EXCEPTIONID}
